name: One Song, One Light
description:
One Song, One Light was made by Albin Karlsson from Shatterplay Studio for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

WARNING: Bright flashing lights! Epileptics beware!

Only one way to get light (from shooting) + listen to one song until finish while moving

It is a twin stick shooter where your goal is to finish listening to one song until it is finished, the song plays for as long as you move, so don't stop! Also the level is pitch black, and you have only the light of your gunshots and bullets to see, so keep shooting! 

Controls:
Left Mouse Button / Gamepad Right Trigger - shoot
Escape - pause
Spacebar / XBox A button - Jump

Gamepad recommended for best experience

There is no gamepad support for menus, sorry it takes too long to code in UE4 for a jam

Shatterplay Studio is working on an awesome Action Adventure game named Unaki, for more info (including a Discord demo):  https://www.shatterplaystudio.com/

Credits to Punch Deck for his awesome Creative Commons music used in this project: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3M9CX5HWSw25k5QL3FkDEA
